publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-618 Roseanna Cunningham: Abolition of Feudal Tenure etc. (Scotland) Bill: Order of Consideration—That the Justice and Home Affairs Committee, in its consideration of the Bill at Stage 2, take the sections in numerical order and each schedule immediately after the section that introduces it.

S1M-618 Roseanna Cunningham: Abolition of Feudal Tenure etc. (Scotland) Bill: Order of Consideration—That the Justice and Home Affairs Committee, in its consideration of the Bill at Stage 2, take the sections in numerical order and each schedule immediately after the section that introduces it.
